entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`rowid` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `nome` TEXT NOT NULL, `portata` INTEGER NOT NULL, `porzioni` TEXT NOT NULL, `preparazione` TEXT NOT NULL, `ingredientiList` TEXT NOT NULL, `isVegetariana` INTEGER NOT NULL, `tempoPreparazione` INTEGER NOT NULL, `serveCottura` INTEGER NOT NULL)

contentSyncTriggers: CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_ricettario_fts_BEFORE_UPDATE BEFORE UPDATE ON `ricettario` BEGIN DELETE FROM `ricettario_fts` WHERE `docid`=OLD.`rowid`; END
CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_ricettario_fts_BEFORE_DELETE BEFORE DELETE ON `ricettario` BEGIN DELETE FROM `ricettario_fts` WHERE `docid`=OLD.`rowid`; END

CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_ricettario_fts_AFTER_UPDATE AFTER UPDATE ON `ricettario` BEGIN INSERT INTO `ricettario_fts`(`docid`, `nome`, `preparazione`, `ingredientiList`) VALUES (NEW.`rowid`, NEW.`nome`, NEW.`preparazione`, NEW.`ingredientiList`); END

CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_ricettario_fts_AFTER_INSERT AFTER INSERT ON `ricettario` BEGIN INSERT INTO `ricettario_fts`(`docid`, `nome`, `preparazione`, `ingredientiList`) VALUES (NEW.`rowid`, NEW.`nome`, NEW.`preparazione`, NEW.`ingredientiList`); END
entities.createSql: CREATE VIRTUAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` USING FTS4(`nome` TEXT NOT NULL, `preparazione` TEXT NOT NULL, `ingredientiList` TEXT NOT NULL, content=`ricettario`)

setupQueries: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS room_master_table (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,identity_hash TEXT)
INSERT OR REPLACE INTO room_master_table (id,identity_hash) VALUES(42, 'e83ea7e79bdfed35e2c605efaa5a4517')
